backup¶

Volume v1

backup create¶

Create new backup

os backup create
    [--container <container>]
    [--name <name>]
    [--description <description>]
    <volume>
--container <container>¶

Optional backup container name

--name <name>¶

Name of the backup

--description <description>¶

Description of the backup

<volume>

Volume to backup (name or ID)

backup delete¶

Delete backup(s)

os backup delete
    <backup> [<backup> ...]
<backup>

Backup(s) to delete (ID only)

backup list¶

List backups

os backup list
--long¶

List additional fields in output

backup restore¶

Restore backup

os backup restore
    <backup>
    <volume>
<backup>

Backup to restore (ID only)

<volume>

Volume to restore to (name or ID)

backup show¶

Display backup details

os backup show
    <backup>
<backup>

Backup to display (ID only)
